Articles.Content:
I'm not sure where to put this, so I'll put it here...

With the launch of Koyagers 10 and 11 on the new horizon, Carl Kerman and a team of specialized people (the forum) has been tasked with the opportunity to record Kerbalkind on a Blutonium record, plated in gold. Hopefully E.Ts will find this and will also have the Oppritunity of discovering the Curiosity and Spirit of what it means to be Kerbal.

RULES...

no roleplaying (this appears to derail threads like this)

no side conversations

no criticizing (don't tell people that "there image or audio can't be here")

and enjoy

FORMATS

Image, this can be art, pictures, diagrams, ETC

Song (just give a kerbalized title), although if you create your own song(if your really that outgoing)

You can borrow images from the actual "Scenes of Earth", or base your image off of theirs (for example the first image will be the Calibration Circle, or you can have an image of the VAB that is based after the UN HQ image.)

You also might want to give an explanation of the media

Reducing the quality also makes the image fit

Enjoy

The Calibration Circle

This image is the first one loaded when the "Scenes of Kerbin is loaded, it means "congrats, if your seeing this... Koyager got off the pad!"
